website_summaries.verdict: This popular humidifier comes with plenty of extra features to keep little ones comfortable all night.
pros: Detachable power cord allows for hassle-free filling
Features two mist intensities and a calming blue night light
Capable of running for up to 16 hours on low
Rotating nozzle allows users to control mist direction
cons: Some users feel the LED is too bright

website_summaries.verdict: Quiet and filter-free, but its 1.5 liter tank is tinier than most and will only humidify small rooms.
pros: The nozzle rotates to direct the mist, and the nightlight can be turned off
Comes with a cleaning brush designed to access hard-to-reach components
cons: The tiny tank capacity makes this suitable for only small rooms with the door closed
Though the nightlight is optional, many users find the illuminated power button too bright for a bedroom

website_summaries.verdict: A quiet, affordable alternative to high-end machines. Ideal for small spaces such as an office or child's bedroom.
cons: Diligent maintenance needed to prevent mold
Power switch uses bright LED light that bothers some sleepers

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean - collects mildew
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier easily grows mildew, which is not uncommon with damp items/appliances. My issue with the humidifier is that it cannot be easily cleaned. The main reservoir can be washed, but the funnel and cap in which the mist comes out of collects terrible mildew and it's practically impossible to clean! The cap does not remove, so there's no way to wipe off the mildew that has grown in its crevices. I do not want my baby inhaling mildew!
customer_reviews.author: ChelAnJoh

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to dry winter air!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier (model no. PEHUMIDIF) several months ago. I was waking up miserable in the mornings with dry mouth and sinuses. I was also experiencing frequent nose bleeds. I began using the humidifier at night in my bedroom which is 14 x 14 feet. After the first use I felt relief. I used the humidifier every night for until the midwest humidity set in. I cleaned the unit and have stored it for next winter. The unit runs quietly and the subtle blue light can also serve as a night light. I am satisfied with the unit and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. Stopped working after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: After using this humidifier a couple of months, it stopped working! It turns on at random times during the day and sometimes there is no water in it so I can't imagine that is good for the mechanical pieces. Now it won't turn on at all. The light indicator is so bright that it lights up my bedroom at night. I've had it turn on randomly in the middle of the night and the "turn on" noise is so loud, it woke me up! I would not recommend this to anyone! Very disappointed and upset for wasting $40 only to buy another one a couple of months later.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great humidity but that little light
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier works great to provide moisture to our bedroom. The only downside is the LED light in the button. The light is very bright and does not turn off. As someone who likes the room to the complete dark this is a downside.
customer_reviews.author: Erienne

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This cool mist humidifier did not disappoint. It's nice and quiet for my work environment and all my co-workers are jealous of this little number. I live in an arid area and it helps with my dry nose and throat. It emits a cool mist so it's more subtle than the warm humidifiers. The unit arrived on time and was super easy to set-up. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sSPARKS 26

customer_reviews.title: Did not last 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2.5 months. It was nice and quiet when it worked. However, after a little over 2 months, it stopped working! Update: I want to give big kudos to SKUniverse (the seller) because after reading the review, they decided to provide a full refund after reaching out. I am impressed with their customer service. 5 stars for SKUniverse.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Leaked everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier worked great the first month or so. One day when I woke up, I noticed that it had leaked everywhere! I assumed that I had not put it together correctly, so I tried it again that night and it was still leaking. I found myself wishing I had read all of the one star reviews that said that it leaked. Luckily, Amazon worked with me and refunded my money even though it had passed the return deadline.
customer_reviews.author: J Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect until it broke.
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly until it stopped, exactly 3 months after I bought it. Now, about 8 hours after a thorough cleaning with vinegar it begins to gurgle air and then water starts coming through the seam between the tank and the base. Now my furniture and floor are damaged too. Does anyone know of a fix for this behavior?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stopped working after 4 months of use . . . Poorly built.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it for the first 3 months and 28 days, then it stopped working. I remember reading the split reviews before I purchased; looks like I was one of those unlucky customers that got a defective one. I used it virtually every day and yesterday it just stopped, won't turn on at all. I opened it up and noticed rust on the screws that secure the "misting" mechanism, definitely a defective seal. Ill be paying a little more for a reliable humidifier next time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Video Review
customer_reviews.text: This cool mist humidifier is really cool looking and provides a good amount of mist, but could be more.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Terrible to clean mildew, broken after cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This thing works, sure, but it is absolutely impossible to clean the mildew/mold that builds up. The various parts do not come apart and there are several crevices you can never get to. I tried cleaned the base with a sponge and soapy water, and had to do quite a bit of scrubbing to clean off the build up. However, because the plug and electronic button are part of the base where mildew builds up, you can't clean it without getting the electronics wet. After a thorough cleaning, the humidifier is broken and unusable. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Hunk of Junk: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I used this hunk of junk *twice*. The first time, it seemed to work alright. The steam is not that powerful. But when it was out of water and I went to refill it, as I was unscrewing the tank cap, the plastic threads on the tank had totally disintegrated and fell/chipped off. It also leaked everywhere from the tank and really leaked everywhere because the plastic threads (which I think are made out of thin plaster) were completely stripped. I was super excited for this thing and now I am so very upset that I wasted $43 for something that kind of worked ONCE. After it's first water refill it was completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Nursery!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product. It is aesthetically pleasing, quiet and efficient. Additionally, it is sleek and easy to clean. On a scale of 1-5 (5 being the best), I rate this product a 5. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This product broke after one year. I used it for the winter of 2016-2017 and pulled it out of storage and it no longer works. I stored it in a safe box and dry. I kept it clean, never got water down the fan tube, and only once lightly brushed the metal component with the supplied cleaning brush. I'm definitely disappointed it broke because when it did work, it was great. It pumped out a lot of moisture for a bedroom. I hate the loud noise it makes when switching settings because it is mostly used at night and can be annoying. It sucks it broke and I am looking into whether I have any warranty for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure Enrichment’s model PEHUMIDIF Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier came out as the best choice for ...
customer_reviews.text: After 5 years of service, my old ultrasonic humidifier quit working. As I always do, I researched a replacement. Pure Enrichment’s model PEHUMIDIF Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier came out as the best choice for me. After receiving my first unit, I was so satisfied I ordered a second unit two days after receiving the first, one for my bedroom and the other for my office. What I like most is the reasonable price, manageable size of the water container and no needleless fancy options that I never used on my older model. The blue light is cool too!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to fully clean, got moldy quickly, so becomes unusable
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy use to and works well except that a pink slime and mold accumulates within 2-3 days of using and no matter how well you clean, rinse, dry, the device doesn't come apart so it doesn't clean completely. Huge bummer because it works wonders at night but when I finally realized it was blowing mold water, despite multiple cleanings/spankings, etc., I have decided to no longer use.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a few months now. It’s fine and is better than nothing. Pros: easy to clean, quiet, water can last for about 15 hours on low use. Cons: the water does not last long enough. If it’s put on high it literally splashes water all over the end table. My fiancé says I sleep better when it’s on and snore less. It gets hot in our bedroom and this helps. I had a different product like this in the last that cost more and worked better but was difficult to clean. Def. use the tablets that are suggested to help keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanfilippo

customer_reviews.title: red light of death but great customer service - update
customer_reviews.text: Mine got the red light of death after three of weeks continuous use. I am actually going to try again and hope the second unit is better than the first as i do like the design and hopefully the replacement will not be one of the ten percent failures the reviews seem to represent. i would like a bit larger reservoir but it does run the entire night without a problem. returned the defective unit and will update review if i get more positive experience with the replacement. Updating my review as in spite of my initial failure have had excellent customer support to address my issue. New unit in place and misting along!
customer_reviews.author: skidoctor

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was a big fan of this humidifier...for maybe 2 months. And that’s probably being generous. I started out running it on high and going through 2 tankfuls of water a day. It saved me when the weather turned cold and dry. Then I noticed that the mist was growing weaker and weaker despite me cleaning it as instructed in the directions until there was no mist at all. I would still let it run anyways to get whatever I could out of it and it would take multiple days for a tank to disappear. Now it has started making an awful, loud, screechy, grinding sound when it’s on. It’s completely unusable. It didn’t even last a single season!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Helps my cat with asthma
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Helps my cat with asthma! Super Quiet & love the Night Light! 5 Star Highly recommended for both adult and pets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: A real piece of junk. The directional nozzle is nearly impossible to rotate. The settings between "low" and "high", nightlight on or off must have been designed by a mentally deficient person: if you lose count how many times you pressed the on/off etc button, your best bet is to pull out the power plug and start from scratch. I would have sent it back, but the hassle to take it to the Post Office is too much and after I would have paid for the shipping cost, it would have been a losing proposition. PAY THE MONEY AND BUY A VICKS MACHINE!
customer_reviews.author: Harro

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: I am going into my third season using this humidifier and have purchased two additional ones as a result for the whole family. It’s easy to clean in that the plug comes right off and it’s small enough to carry to the sink or tub to clean. The only downside I’ve found is that it’s quite difficult to get ALL the water out of the tank because the tank doesn’t have an angle for all water to come out. I’ve seen other reviews suggesting that the inside of the tank is impossible to clean... true, but I’ve never had a buildup in there. I simply rinse it out with hot water, sometimes vinegar added, but it stays pretty clean.
customer_reviews.author: Angie W

customer_reviews.title: The Best Humidifier on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I've had three MistAire Humidifiers for over 2 years and there is absolutely nothing like it. It's the quietest we've ever owned and you cannot hear it even if you press your ear right up against the motor. Plus, the mist is so easily adjustable. As for cleaning, I can't imagine anything easier because after 2 years ours still doesn't need any cleaning. There is no scaly, grimy, or any gunk in the tank. It looks brand new every few days I have to fill it. We also use it every night in all three rooms and again, all three seem like we just took them out of the box. THESE ARE AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: P. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Whisper Quiet
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier is the quietest one I've ever had so I'm finally able to keep it on at night. The size is perfect for my nightstand and it was very easy to assemble, clean and set up for first time use. The humidifier gives a constant stream of moisture (quietly) without making the room too cold or leaving condensation either. Very happy with the purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Naddy

customer_reviews.title: Imposible to clean and grows mold inside
customer_reviews.text: At first I was really glad to get it, however This humidifier easily grows mold inside, which is normal, but the issue with the humidifier is that I can clean it. The main reservoir can be washed, but the tunnel and cap in which the mist comes out of collects terrible mildew and it's practically impossible to clean! The cap does not remove, so there's no way to wipe off the mold that has grown. It is recommended to deeply clean this every 3 days and it is impossible. Whoever is breathing this air, is also breathing whatever grows inside
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier last year and it worked great. When I set it up to use this year, I thought it wasn't working correctly and since it was still in warranty, I contacted the seller who immediately sent a replacement. When I got the replacement and looked at the instructions, I realized that I hadn't remembered how to operate it correctly, and the fault was mine, not the humidifier. I contacted the seller and offered to send the replacement back, but they generously allowed me to keep it. Very impressive customer service! I also have their larger unit and it's on its third season. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Haven

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after a month...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Pure got back to me and they are sending a replacement unit. Their support is really great. ORIGINAL REVIEW: This is a nice unit and it worked great - raised humidity to about 40% in a smaller room. Quiet operation too, even on a high output mist. Nice night light. I was using filtered water from Pur. Unfortunately it started leaking after less than a month. It leaks where bottom and top parts come together. Unit looks very clean, didn't see any dirt or mold blocking valve. Seems like that's a common problem. Wish I read more reviews before purchase... Waiting if I will hear back from Pure.
customer_reviews.author: Pauli Jr

customer_reviews.title: Use distilled water and be gentle with the reservoir
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this humidifier for a couple of years and use it in the winter when it gets dry. I am very satisfied with it and it usually lasts the whole night on high. They have a mode where the light goes dim but the unit stays on (for night time) . However, the light is still to bright and I cover it with a piece of paper so i can sleep. I've run tap water through it which is not the best thing to do and it works great. That being said you must clean the inside and remove scale from the ultrasonic emitter and the plastic to prevent buildup and damage.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet - UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: This little unit puts out a lot of moisture into the air, and runs a long time on one tank. I like the bright and dim settings also. Great purchase! My only concern is that there is no way to get inside the tank, and eventually slime builds up. I usually can get most of it with filling and shaking vigorously, but would love to REALLY get it cleaned and sanitized. If you have suggestions.... I'd sure appreciate! * 2/14/20 Gina, in customer service is great! I now know I am to clean the unit with vinegar and water once a week. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie52

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! Jan. 4, 2018: Much better!
customer_reviews.text: Used it in the first year. Worked great. Second year, it worked once and then the red light came on. Refilled it. TRIED to turn it on. Only the red light shows, VERY DISAPPOINTED. This item was not inexpensive! Added review Jan. 4, 2018: I received a complimentary new humidifier after my review. I was quite surprised and delighted the company took my review seriously and backs their product enough to give me a chance to see it working well. This new one is working perfectly. The red light occasionally comes on when I first turn it on, but quickly switches to working order.
customer_reviews.author: Abe Raab

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a friend that uses it at night during the winter months. I was sadly disappointed at how little it does. Previous humidifiers made the room a lot less stuffy and better with the dry Apt heat. This doesn't do it at all. It also has a bright power button light. Why would anyone want a power light on the button? It has a nightlight mode already if you wanted a bright light to keep you awake at night. Unfortunately It was past the 30 day return from Amazon. I recently saw a neighbor have one with a free sign on it down the street as well in perfect condition. Hers will gain some company.
customer_reviews.author: JonT

customer_reviews.title: Works great for one season...DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this product at all costs! A four-star review down to one. I would give it a zero if I could. After letting it fully dry out from last year and stored safely in a cupboard, we were disappointed to discover taking it out today that the motor had declined massively, not propelling air and especially problematic—the stream adjuster no longer works and we have to adjust it with pliers. This machine runs non-stop...even when it’s off. It will still blow cold air and operates though it is not “on”. It cannot be left plugged in or on continuous run. It cannot be left in its own water pool (within the machine).
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Not convenient to pour water
customer_reviews.text: This product is overrated and over priced. It is not convenient to pour water since you have to flip the tank and unscrew the cap to refill water. No handle to grip the tank. You have to hold the tank with both hands. You have to wait until the water completely run out before refilling. If you lift up the tank while water in it, there is a spill. Other similar products allow you to pour water from the top without any spill. Bad design by having one push button for all functions, light, no light with low mist, light, no light with high mist. If you miscount the push, it turns off and you have to start over again.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Mighty but bright
customer_reviews.text: USE DISTILLED WATER, it makes a huge difference. You don't have to but you won't believe how clean it stays with distilled. Ok, now you know. Works well. Good output. It's binary output low/high, no dial. Has a light on and light off for low and high. HOWEVER the light, though a pleasant blue, is pretty bright for a kid's room. And once they know it has a light, they turn it in themselves, on touch pad button. If the light had a dimmer, would've given 5 stars. Oh, use distilled water. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Waste money, not worth to buy
customer_reviews.text: I clean it every week and change water everyday but it get mold very easily. And it is very hard to clean. doctor recommend not to use it after it get mold so I just spend $40 for one month use. It is my second time to purchase it and I though it is my fault didn’t keep it clean but the second one I clean very often still same issue. Just Waste money not worth to buy
customer_reviews.author: lulu990099

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of all the reviews but mine didn't work right at all. The light stayed red the entire time...guess it couldn't detect the tank? Water kept leaking out, and for the 5 minutes the light was blue, the water wasn't turning into vapor. It just bubbled a little. I think I just received a defective machine and I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Lu

customer_reviews.title: Did not like product but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edited to add.. Fantastic customer service! I received a refund very quickly and customer service was a pleasure to work with. I would purchase from them again. ---- After a month and a half, I am already buying a different humidifier. We set this up in my daughter's nursery. After a few hours on, there was white dust everywhere. We also have it set in a small room and the tank empties really quickly. It's lightweight, so it knocks over somewhat easily. Overall, not a good fit for a nursery and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Phillygal84

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Support Ever!
customer_reviews.text: It's been over 4 years since I purchased this humidifier. It was working just fine, but it suddenly stopped working. Since the warranty period was 5 long years, I contacted the customer support via e-mail thinking I wouldn't get a reply forever. Surprisingly I got a response asking for some info including a video of my not fully functional humidifier very quickly. After reviewing the info I provided, they shipped a replacement unit right away! I was so impressed by the extremely simple return process and prompt replies from the customer support. They definitely exceeded my expectation by far!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: great for the price and size but Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: 2 months of owning humidifier is great for the size and price but its very hard to clean you have a tiny soft bristle brush that doesnt do much. Pink mold will form in hard to reach areas and crevices. the bottom of the water container will collect mold/grime and mildew. there is no way to really open the water container to clean beside the screw on cap. i tried the whole clean with vinegar water solution but you really need to scrub the bottom which is unaccesible. soaking doesnt do much. overall, not good for long term use. mold in your humidifier defeats the purpose of the humidifier. if youre sick if youre going to breathe in humidified mold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my cool mist humidifier yesterday and I have to say, I am very happy I bought it. I work in a small office, my room is not bigger than 6 ft by 10 ft and with the forced air we have, my nose and throat were always bothering me with such dry air. Now, even if it was only day 2 of using the machine, I feel and noticed a huge difference with my nose and throat. Great little machine, very helpful and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Used unit a few times.
customer_reviews.text: After a few water filled tanks, it needs cleaning. However, it's quite a task to get inside the gadget. I could not get all the water sediment from the bottom. When I filled the tank and turned it on, I could smell an odor, it had to be the yellow/brown residue from prior use that was impossible to get to. I also had issues with water spilling out of the unit. It was a waste of my money, it sits in the closet taking up space.
customer_reviews.author: Mer-is-me

customer_reviews.title: Cracks in plastic
customer_reviews.text: I was so thrilled when it came, I didn't realize that it had 2 cracks. One on the plastic outside and one on the tube that transports the mist up. I had already thrown out the box (dang trash day) or I would've sent it back and bought a different one. I'm learning from my mistake! The mist that is coming out of the machine is very weak compared to the other one I purchased. I am NOT thrilled to have wasted $40.
customer_reviews.author: A Catlover In Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but light is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my toddler’s room after our old one quit working. It works well, holds a lot of water, and is extremely quiet but we are SO disappointed in the light. She sleeps best in a very dark room and the light from the power button is very bright (even without the night light setting on). We taped a piece of cardboard over the button, but when everything else is dark in the room the light actually lights up the entire white base, and reflects onto the table it sits on as well. I wish I still had the box for this to return it because it does not work for our needs
customer_reviews.author: Leah F.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Nice humidifier that not only looks nice, but works very well and is ultra quiet. Unfortunately it did stop working after about a year, however, after contacting customer service they agreed to replace the unit w/o any problems. This brand comes with a 5 year warranty that they honor and do not give you a hard time about. I did not even have to return the old humidifier. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: JASH

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this humidifier, I was nervous about the negative reviewers about cleaning it, honestly it’s easy to clean. Appreciate the options for a little or stronger stream. It’s not as quiet as I hoped and even though I don’t use the nightlight option, the blue “on” light is rather bright, wish it had an option to turn that off. Overall, it’s a great buy, highly recommend, 4 stars because of the bright light, and nosier than I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: tmWVUrm44

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would need to refill every night
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is great if you don't have a lot of surface space for a humidifier. That being said, you will need to refill the container every night. Not a negative, but a good to know. My step kids aren't with us every night, so my husband and I agreed that this would be best placed in their room since it would be less frequently used (meaning we won't have to fill up every night). The machine is definitely quiet and I do like that it has a light feature that illuminates the base if you want it. So it could almost act as a night light for the kids too. Overall, I think the machine works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnie

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Fantastic Customer service
customer_reviews.text: We bought the item 3 years ago and have been using it in our bedroom ever since as our house has very dry forced air heating. Its very quiet (apart from the beeping when turning on/off) and really helps keep the humidity in our large bedroom. It recently stopped working and one call to the customer service wa all it took for them to send out a replacement!! This is an amazing warranty and unbelievable customer service.... I will search out Pure Enrichment for future purchases as I'm now a loyal customer. My only issue is the brightness of the blue power on light on this specific device.
customer_reviews.author: MrW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works for our baby :)
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our baby room and it works really well (one month and going). The blue light on the button is bright enough without turning on the night light mode which is really bright then. It's a nice soothing blue. The two options of slow and fast mist are good speeds/options. On high speed you can use it all night if you fill it to the top. On low speed you can use it for two nights without refilling. Our baby seems to like it and the 'gluck gluck' sound every once in a while is very quiet and not a bother at all. I can definitely recommend this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Maja

customer_reviews.title: Provides great humidity, but cleaning is a pain
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier certainly does a great job at providing humidity to a smaller space. It's quiet and the nightlight is a nice plus. I only have to fill it once a day in order to provide my bedroom plenty of moisture to help fight the horridly dry mid western USA winter air. The big issue I have with this item is the cleaning process. I do feel I have to clean it very often, even when using distilled water. While the tank is easy enough to clean, I find the base hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: AMG de Wet

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: After seeing all the negative reviews, I decided to wait a few months to review this. I've had it for 4 months now and have used it every night. It has a low and a high setting. I've never had any problems with it leaking or anything like that. I always make sure the lid is screwed on enough so maybe that's why?? Overall, it's been a great product and I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: KettleCornwall

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after only a month of use at night. Cleaned and made sure everything is tight.
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with this unit for about 3 weeks. Now all of a sudden it lights up like it is working but no vapor is coming out. Then we noticed the water was coming out between the top part and the base. I made sure to clean this and everything with it due to not using distilled water but it is still leaking all over. I see several people have had this issue. I really love everything about it otherwise, but anytime you have water leaking and electricity... and besides that not having a unit that works. If anyone has suggestions on how to fix the leaking please let me know!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Shull

customer_reviews.title: I wish I got one sooner
customer_reviews.text: I have been extremely satisfied with my Pure Enrichment Humidifier. I originally purchased the humidifier with the belief that it would help me with my asthma. It has done just that! It lasts all throughout the night and helps me breath easier and cough less. I'd have breathing problems and cough regularly, but after a few days of getting the humidifier my symptoms significantly reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: An attractive cool mist humidifier that works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 Mistaire ultrasonic cool mist humidifiers for my apartment. (1 for my bedroom & 1 for my living room) I love them! It is small and has an attractive design. It has different speeds of mist, (on low the tank lasts over 24 hours) It provides cool mist, so I don't get too hot at night. I love it! Works like a charm! The humidifier has helped my allergies and my skin. I have recommended it to several of my friends. I am a very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Espy

customer_reviews.title: This one keeps going.
customer_reviews.text: It's ,my third this winter. The other two just stopped working. MistAire puts out a consistent flow, day after day, without any problems. It has two speeds, and I only turn it off when it's very humid outside. Only downsides are: Because it is small, it has to be refilled at least every two days but can easily be done even at a bathroom sink. Also the blue light may be a problem to some people if light is in bedroom. But on low light level, it doesn't bother me. My best friend has this model, too, and it is very reliable with a nice light level -- so I got one too. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: SusieS

customer_reviews.title: Beware of flooding
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this device maybe less than a dozen times and it is already faulty. Like other reviews, the reservoir will begin to flood and mist will stop working. Not sure what this is from but it cannot be from lack of cleaning or whatnot. Also, on high it only lasts maybe 2 hours at most, you definently can't leave this on overnight. Seems a bit too fragile, will invest in something better next.
customer_reviews.author: suzpop

customer_reviews.title: Fall Asleep and Stay Asleep
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Pure Enrichment humidifier for two weeks now and I absolutely love it! All modes of operation are quiet and I can easily fall asleep with it running in the background. The night light feature is a nice, calming blue and has had no issues thus far (although I admit, I rarely use this feature). Since I have begun using the humidifier, I have not woken up with dry mouth once! This is the sole reason I bought it and I am very happy with the result. Overall, it is easy to use, quiet, and works great! I am quite pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st item i bought. I just purchased a 2nd one for my sons room because of the size and how well it has been working. I have only had the 1st on for a few days and about 20mins ago i hear water hitting the floor. The device stopped working but the water portiin continues to drain and its leaking on the floor. i have tried several times to make sure its seated correctly. it will start working and after a couple minutes stops and leaks. Not Happy
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR GREAT! JUST A BIT CONCERNED
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE I am a bit concerned about the amount of water in the tray where the two pieces meet. It's working wonderfully and maybe this is what's supposed to happen. Time will tell. I ordered this product this morning, it was delivered this afternoon, and I've had it running a few hours. I think it's a great product for the money, easy to use, it looks nice. Touch button on front, spin the top to direct the mist. Please watch the video.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Scherrer

customer_reviews.title: Performs great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this humidifier in a small bedroom and it performs well. It is quiet enough to have it running while I sleep. I have had several different humidifiers made by other manufacturers and this has been the best one. But the best thing about it is company's service. I lost the screw on cap for the tank which you screw on and off when filling the tank with water. I went to their website and under the support link was their phone number (which so often is not supplied by companies.) I called it, waited about 45 seconds to be connected to a representative, whose English was impeccable, and placed an order for a replacement cap.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Lier

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: It's not easy to clean. It can get mildew-y and you have to be gentle cleaning around the ultra sonic thing. You can't just rinse it under the faucet because there's an opening where water can get inside the humidifier. It is quiet. It has a cool looking blue night light feature that you can turn on/off. It only has one button to control the on/off and high/low settings. And it's more like a touch screen sensor kind of thing. You can just hover your finger over it and it will work. But you have to cycle through all the settings to get to the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of mold and other build up
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how this unit gets such good reviews. Yes, it's quiet, but that's about it with the pros. Despite following the cleaning instructions and weekly cleanings, mold and other build up still occur, and in places that's impossible to clean. The part where the steam exits, look closely in that tube, I got some really disgusting build up in there, and I'm not even sure how that's possible. I even switched to distilled water, but the problem still persists. I returned the unit.
customer_reviews.author: JeffCh

customer_reviews.title: Great value helps me sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Pures dehumidifier is a very nice little appliance. Its runs with a light hum and the sound of the vapor hissing lightly out of its spout.The night light feature is also quite nice illuminating the room with a gentle blue is actually very relaxing. I have chronic sleep problems and this appliance helped soothe my waking and inability to fall asleep. Cleaning is simple just rinse with water and light soap if necessary I have treated water in my home so I experience no build up or residue despite living in Florida where we dela with hard water. I recommend purchasing this affordable appliance if you want to sleep and relax in a soothing setting.
customer_reviews.author: MACXAVIER

customer_reviews.title: Amazing humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier! It lasts forever and I can run it around the clock temporarily filling up as needed when lil kiddos get sick. No need to refill for about 24 hours. It's quiet and has a night light if wanted and different flow rates. It's easy to clean with a little vinegar and water and brush if needed. I don't ever leave it empty and running and I rinse out water when not using and never leave water stagnant. The customer service for the company is amazing. I had a couple minor problems and both times they sent me a replacement or replacement part even past the warranty. You can't go wrong with purchasing this humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Works well, Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier works well. It’s very quiet and has two levels of mist. However, it’s very hard to clean and easy to gain algae, which cannot be scrubbed off because you don’t have full access to the tank. I use tap water which may make a difference with this, so using distilled water would probably be better. I soak the interior with vinegar once a week and use a Protec cleaning ball which helps to eliminate the buildup. The company was very helpful upon realization that I was having issues cleaning and offered to help me with a tank that would fit my needs better. Definitely recommend this company :)
customer_reviews.author: Amber Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: The machine is quiet and easy to fill / operate, but it is IMPOSSIBLE to properly clean. There are so many areas that a cleaning brush can’t reach. Mildew builds up really quickly, and it’s impossible to get it wiped out (even after soaking in vinegar water). So I can’t in good conscience put it back in my baby’s room to run. Sadly, it’s now unusable. I also wouldn’t recommend this product if you like a very dark room. The on light is positioned to illuminate through the water and is quite bright. No way to turn off that light unless you cover up the machine w a towel (except the top portion where the mist comes out)
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Improved quieter beep!
customer_reviews.text: I felt like this product deserves a positive review. I bought one around 2018 for my nursery - it was great, easy to clean, but the beeping between stages was SO loud. Such a pain. Recently, both me and my baby are sick, and I decided to buy a second one. The company has clearly lowered the volume which I super appreciate. I put the quieter one in the nursery. I do wish they would consider changing the light color. Blue is not a good “middle of the night” color because it’s too bright. A warm amber would be much less distracting.
customer_reviews.author: SCA

customer_reviews.title: Humidifier doesn’t work when full
customer_reviews.text: Great humidifier when it’s not totally filled with water. The problem I’m having is when I fill it to the top, and I need to fill it so it can make it till I get home to keep my guitars properly humidified, is it struggles to push vapor out when it’s filled, if I empty half the water out it works great, I guess it’s a design flaw, I have a different humidifier that doesn’t have that problem. I bought the second one cause with the very dry winter air I need to put on a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl  Rose

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because it was Amazon Recommended, horrible recommendation
customer_reviews.text: broke down on us quite often. I followed all the rules and used the right water. Randomly it would not work, the next day you could see the mist coming from the top, the next day it was broke again. So I am giving up on it and will try something different. I bought this because it was Amazon Recommended, horrible recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: S. Duke

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I've had this unit for about a month and it is works great. It's quiet and easy to clean. At first I wasn't getting enough output but then I read that perhaps the water was too cold. I switched to luke warm water and it works much better. I see some customers complaining about the blue light. Just to clarify for anyone who has not yet purchased the unit - you can turn off the night light feature and the only blue light is a power indicator light. I like to sleep in a dark room and can't believe that tiny light could be a problem unless you sleep with the humidifier a few inches away from your face.
customer_reviews.author: cipster

customer_reviews.title: It was good while it worked
customer_reviews.text: It was good while it worked, I received it march 5th & only started using it last week, after 4 uses it stopped producing any mist, I thought that there might not be enough water even though i could see water in the tank. When I removedghe tank to refilli found alot of water in tbe bottom compartment, I refilled the tank and putit back on the base as i have been doing, the water immediately released into the bottom compartment snd started to overflow, so basically the tnak is not holding water & when i plug it no mist blows. I am kind of disappointed because i got a “cheaper” smaller size humidifier and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Needs a design change and better instructions
customer_reviews.text: They should have a read-out or a numbered dial to make it clear which of the 5 operational options you are using. The user manual could also use more detailed information. For instance, it doesn't even tell you how often you should do general cleaning; it gives some specifics about descaling, but that's it. Interesting that it doesn't call for using distilled water. If that's not needed they should say why. Also, while the user manual does put the website address on the last page, there is no contact number in the guide. You have to go to the site to find one.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jezior

customer_reviews.title: can't tell a difference...
customer_reviews.text: our unit did not come with a cleaning brush, I purchase for the winter months and how our heaters dry out our air. it really seems to make no difference in our bedroom. I am not sure if it's because it is cool mist, our old humidifier was warm mist and made a huge difference. I wouldn't purchase it again, but its a decent set up. The little light on the inside even when not being completely used is still pretty bright.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Encinas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works great
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use. You pop off the blue bubble top, flip it over, take off cap, add water, replace cap, flip it over and drop it back into white base. It has 5 settings (some with light blue night light, others without). You run your finger over the button on the side to cycle through the settings. The settings determine how much mist comes out and if the light is on. I am amazed at the mist output of this device. I use it every night. It usually last a couple of nights before I have to refill it, but it only takes a few minutes to refill. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: better than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used a humidifier in a few years but needed one for my baby. The mist is finer than I thought it would be, which is good. There is a blue light on the unit that stays on. It is the power button and used to cycle through the different modes. It's not that bright so I don't mind. It allows you to easier control in the dark. Their is another blue light inside the unit used as a nightlight. This can be turned off if you don't need it. Unit has been very quiet and I haven't had to do much cleaning after about 5 uses. I am using distilled water. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Izabel Armas

customer_reviews.title: Small tank, annoying shape, just ok for a small room.
customer_reviews.text: This works fine but it isn't great for me. First, it's listed under "whole house humidifier" and unless you live in a doll house that is not really correct. The shape may be sexy, but it's annoying to refill. Look at the images of the product and imagine holding the tank upside down with the crazy shape of it. You have to hold it the whole time the tank is filling up. At least that isn't too long because the tank is pretty small. Just OK. Not great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love it and highly recommend this if..
customer_reviews.text: A humidifier is great for dry skin! I have eczema and when my skin is especially dry and etc I use this humidifier when I sleep and I wake up to soft skin and hair. The downside is that your hair might look a little oily sometimes but there are adjustment levels - low and high levels. Using the humidifier, you really feel the difference when you wake up. A great item for skincare. And especially great if you struggle with dry skin, whether just during winter time or all the time!!! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Humid Air, No Mold!!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the 1.5L MistAire for a couple weeks now and love it! Super quiet, with a sleek style that doesn't distract from our decor! Hands-down, this product is 100x better than all wicking/pump type humidifiers that all seem just to promote some sort of mold growth within the units, and inconveniently then blow that into the air we breathe... ugh. The ultrasonic design to create a clean, safe mist is the best! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: David O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Quiet Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This little humidifier works well and is very quiet. I’ve been having problems with dry eyes at night and this really helped. It does need to be filled twice a day but I really appreciate the small size so I can’t complain. The design is really nice and the nightlight feature is useful at times. This humidifier keeps my bedroom comfortable, but not the whole house. This humidifier came well-packaged in materials that were easy to recycle - no styrofoam- yay for that!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up this room!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used it in my room in the morning and my daughter room in the night So worth it!!! I live in a custom room, where is smells humidity like crazy, and the hotness of Florida doesn’t help. I don’t have no central AC which makes it worse. My husband bought this since for me I have horrible asthma and he got allergies.. same as my daughter as soon as I come from work , I refill it and put it in her room is been a great help
customer_reviews.author: Angelica maria mejia

customer_reviews.title: Cannot last.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it about a year ago, and only used it for about two seasons(2017Winter and 2017Fall). Right now, it's not working at all. Whatever I do, only the red light flashes. Low quality, you can buy a good humidifier from a local supermarket for 10 dollars more and you are still saving your money. Cannot last. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has been reliable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these units...close to 3 years now..and all 3 are purring..1 has an occasional whizzing noise buts goes away! All 3 units Have performed incredibly well.. Of course if you want clean mist, you need to keep the unit clean also...LIGHT MAINTENANCE really pays off...Vinegar solutions and common sense...3 years and i spent about 30 minutes cleaning all 3 and they're working like champs... Lowest setting goes for 2 days at least it does for me, I keep it very clean and that's the key..
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey g adams

customer_reviews.title: Go with a different brand!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could return. Constantly has a water dripping sound, and every so often a loud bubbling sounds which wakes me up. Also, there’s a light on the inside of the water tank that you can’t turn off. If you like to sleep with your room totally dark like I do, this is a deal breaker for this humidifier. I know have to sleep with an eye mask whenever I run this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Initial issues, but fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: Worked for the first month, but subsequently started spewing water out of the base. Update: After leaving this review, Pure sent me a new and improved unit. I'm pleasantly surprised to see several updates that previous reviewers had complained about: - Mode switch beep is far, far quieter. Now only slightly audible to indicate the mode has switched. - Power button light isn't so bright. Now it's not so sharp during the night - Unit seems to have a better mechanism at the bottom of the container for dispersing the mist I've found that these improvements fix every aspect I could have complained about before. Most importantly, this unit seals well and no water has exited the device. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Poyourow

customer_reviews.title: I've used 2 Water Bottle Type Ultrasonic Humidifiers, but this is the best!
customer_reviews.text: In the past I've used the small, Water Bottle Type Ultrasonic Humidifiers; and while they did the job of providing a constant stream of cool mist while I slept, they eventually leaked all over my table and floor. This is the first Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier that is reliable and has a tank which can last two nights on a refill at the low setting. No leaks. The switch is super sensitive to the touch and the night light function is an added bonus. You can get a low stream or a high stream, lights on or off. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Peace Love & Sleep
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE the humidifier. This was my first time ever using one after many years of saying I would get one for better quality of sleep. I finally decided to get this one off amazon based on the reviews. I love the quiet sound of the mist and the blue night light which I feel coupled with my Himalayan salt lamp, and weighted blanket poses for such a warm cozy restful sleep. Thank you, my one uoset is, I wanted to place some essential oils in the water, I thought I could do that and the instructions said to only use water in the tank. Bummer! But I am still HAPPPY nonetheless!!! Teshia
customer_reviews.author: AfroCentricLovePower

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and whisper silent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my plants, my fiddle leaf fig and my majesty palm need moisture and humidity and I'm able to point this directly at my plants. It runs for hours once filled and there's even the option of a night light setting (that make my plants look very cool at night, btw.) The mist is cool and it doesn't make your house feel humid (so your hair will still look nice.) The humidifier has several settings depending on your needs. I haven't needed to clean it and it is silent. If you don't look at it you wont know it's running, it's that quiet. Just fill it up and turn it on. That's all to it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefany Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I like nothing about this product! Its very compact for a humidifier! It's the quietest machine, you dont even know it's on! The air force is amazing! I I suffer from allergies eczema and asthma. I'm breathing better MY SKIN HASNT NEED MOISTURIZER! THATS A MIRACLE FOR ME! I live on the east coast so my fair skin takes a beaten! Not this year! My husband is shocked! I cannot tell you how cool this product is w 4 different settings it's so easy to use refill and it's so quiet it's crazy! I love you P💧RE!! Thx u for changing my life for the better!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Nice humidifier for the price point
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this humidifier! It is very quiet and I have had no problems with “white powder”. I also like the feature that enables you to have the soft blue light or- not. It does shut off automatically when the water runs out, some do not. The button is extremely sensitive, just barely touch it to turn off/on. I have had for about 2 weeks and upon inspection have not had to clean it yet so cannot answer that question yet. Overall- a really nice little unit for the price
customer_reviews.author: Seairra

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: WASTE OF MONEY!!! This thing stopped working after two uses!! I only used it at night to sleep. So it ran for about 7hrs each night. By night 3 it turned on but no steam came out. I let it run thinking maybe it needs to warm up. But when I woke up the next morning still nothing & the water level hadn’t changed...... I’ve been trying it every night since then but I still get nothing. So please don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Raven O.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in January when I was ill and needed a humidifier. Before it arrived, I was feeling better so I never opened package until I was ill this time. I read directions, found a piece was missing, but figured it was just the plastic piece on top of where mist comes out to direct mist; used distill water and plugged it in and went to sleep. Next morning the humidifier was sitting in a puddle of water. Never turned it on again, defective but since I bought it months ago, can't return for refund. Will buy a local one to replace bad unit. Don't waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ann Hull Labbe

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in Less than a Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Dec 2018. I just went to refill it and it started leaking EVERYWHERE. When I lifted the water chamber, it had a massive crack in the reservoir where the water falls into. I had to throw it away immediately and was highly disappointed as I use this often. It's never been dropped or anything. How does this happen?
customer_reviews.author: Girl from Jersey

customer_reviews.title: We liked it for a while...
customer_reviews.text: We liked it for awhile. It didn’t leak, which was the reason why we replaced a different humidifier with this one. However, it was hard to clean the base of the tank and the little tube opening inside the water tank. The base itself was fine to clean, but inside the tank was difficult. If we had kept up with cleaning it daily/weekly with bleach solution and vinegar, it might be okay still -so that’s our fault. I tried disassembling it to deep clean everything, and I ended up breaking some pieces (oops!). So we just replaced it with a different humidified that’s actually much better and easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: An Dang

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a humidifier since my kids were little but I came down with an awful cold and the dry air in the house certainly didn't help. This was the perfect solution. It's whisper-quiet and really easy to use. It lasts all day and night even on high. I am so glad I purchased this one. The only thing that would make it better is if it was cordless and able to be charged via USB, then I wouldn't have to unplug it to move it to the bedroom at night. Otherwise, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean, growing mold?
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and quiet although impossible to thoroughly clean it. The tube part has black spots on the inside which I’m assuming is mold and I have no way of cleaning that or the inside of the tank which has a yellow grime on it. I was able to clean the outside of it(second pic) but still can’t clean the inside parts and don’t feel that it’s safe to see for my babies room anymore unfortunately. We bought this in Dec 2017 and only used it when we were sick, so maybe a couple to a few weeks out of the year and would leave it to dry in between uses but it still has mold.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: PAIN IN THE
customer_reviews.text: this one lacks a lot of features. (1) You cannot change the output setting (low/medium/high). (2) i put this on at night and i cannot sleep with light in the room - theres a light that will not turn off and it illuminates the clear container inadvertently. (3) the container is small so u have to refill it often and with that, (4) the shape of the container is really odd so filling it up is a struggle. I only bought this one bc i cant find the one i had before on here.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all night and more
customer_reviews.text: I love it- quite and puts out just the right amount of moisture. I was hesitant to order it because the water tank is smaller then many others however it lasts all night on high without a problem. The customer service by the manufacturer is exemplary - they proactively contacted me to make sure that I was happy with my purchase. I also received a free de-calcification cartridge for providing them with my feedback. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Ok if you sit right next to it. Bad nozzle design
customer_reviews.text: This product is so small that it should have been clearly written on the site rather than only hinted at in the number of liters of water it holds. Gallons would have been more helpful for Americans to visually conceptualize. This unit may be decent for a small office where you sit right next to the thing, otherwise don't waste your time. Also, the small dial at the top to redirect the flow is pathetic at best. Maybe you could use a pencil to help turn it but it's not designed well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier!!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently ordered this humidifier for my mother who is dealing with a dry cough! During the first night of usage, I notice quite a significant difference and less coughing! It has really help her lessen the cough! The night light effect is really great and she enjoys it immensely! I love that the mist is not overwhelming and has a directional spout. We are really enjoying the Mistaire UltraSonic Cool Mist Humidifier! I think I might order one for myself! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Hall

customer_reviews.title: It died just past its two year warranty...
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier worked just fine from purchase 5 December 2015, for remainder of that Winter and Winter, 2016. However, when setting up for Winter 2017 operation just a week ago, it simply would not operate and 14 days past its two year warranty. It was clean and ready to put in use again, but sadly it had other plans. I would like to purchase another, since the tank, caps, and brush are in good condition, but not sure since the motor appears to be the weak link and the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sontag Montag

customer_reviews.title: SKEPTICAL? Don't be!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely silent and works really well! With the winter upon us, I was getting tired of choosing which of my two sick boys got to use the "Vicks" brand humidifier we already had. I was skeptical of the previous reviews saying this thing was super quiet because the other one we have sounds like a Yeti blowing his nose. But seriously, this UltraSonic Cool Mist Humidifier is SILENT. And it looks great. I haven't had to clean it yet, but it does come with a handy-dandy cleaning brush to get to the harder to reach parts of the humidifier. Really, REALLY pleased with this, and I may pick up another one and donate the old one we have.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M

product_meta.title: Pure Enrichment MistAire Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier - Premium Humidifying Unit with 1.5L Water Tank, Whisper-Quiet Operation, Automatic Shut-Off and Night Light Function - Lasts Up to 16 Hours
feature_bullets: ULTRASONIC COOL MIST TECHNOLOGY: Safely moisturizes the air for up to 16 hours of continuous operation so you can breathe easy and get more restful sleep | High and low speed settings make it easy to adjust mist direction and speed to fit your comfort level
1.5-LITER WATER TANK: Provides ideal coverage for bedrooms, offices, and other medium-sized rooms
OPTIONAL NIGHT LIGHT: Offers soothing glow for maximum relaxation
AUTOMATIC SHUT-OFF: Turns humidifier off when water level is low or the water tank is removed

WHAT YOU GET: Humidifier, AC power adapter, disk cleaning brush, user manual, industry-leading 5 Year Warranty, caring customer support 7 days a week, and the peace of mind that comes from a trusted brand with millions of customers worldwide.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars27,516 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
